title: Looking for a not so sweet Caroline
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: Looking for a not so sweet Caroline
posts.post_content: Does anyone have a Carolina Brights graded 1.5 or a nice 1 (is there such a thing) that they would be looking to sell or trade.  I know I've seen this thread a dozen times  from other members but figured I'd give it a shot too.  I'd love to add one to my collection.  Thanks!
